projects.description: Safe Place is the final project in Re:coded Frontend Web Development bootcamp three teammates and I built within a four week timespan under Agile processes. The website aims to tackle the problem of domestic violence against women in three ways: providing immediate help, assisting women in reaching psychological resources and helping them achieve financial independence.

M.Y-Inventory is an inventory management system that was created during the 2020 Innovation Hackathon. The project was awarded third place. As a team of five, we had to solve the problem of the social enterprise, Tina-Zita, who was struggling with keeping track of kitchen inventory.
Task Manager is a website for managing daily routines and tasks. User can register, add, delete and completemark as completed tasks and boards of tasksboards.
This website is an online database of actors and movies, sortable by genres, rating and popularity. Information about movies and actors was retrieved from The Movie DB API.
Mad Libs is a phrasal template word game that consists of one player prompting others for a list of words to substitute for blanks in a story before reading aloud.
